work.name: Paintings for the senses
work.description: Paintings for the senses is a sensorial excursion in Lithuanian National Art gallery. For the participant it is a possibility to experience works of art non visually.
work.performers:
Karolina Žernytė, Aistė Jančiūtė, Artūras Lepiochinas, Jaunius Pisaravičius, Vaidotas Bačianskas, Raminta Šniaukštaitė 
Guide and consultant: Eglė Nedzinskaitė.

rider.language: The piece is in English without translation. There is no script of the piece.
rider.stage: Minimum size 12 meters per 12 meters. Black box. No dance floor.
rider.sound: 2 HF microphones hung on the performers’ T-shirts
